Interface IsDeadConnectionException

All Known Implementing Classes:
ConnectionAbortedException, HostDownException, ThriftStateException, TimeoutException, TransportException, UnknownException
public interface IsDeadConnectionException

Describes an exception after which a connection is no longer usable.
